name: Geometry Wars (hulgarth)
description:
Description

Geometry wars is a 2 sided "Turret Defense" where you must balance both sides of the board as they share turret slots.  This game is my entry into the "Epic Mega Jam 2022" If you enjoy what I can do in 5 days, please consider checking out what I can do with 2 years by taking a look at my most recent release to steam "Game Dev Masters" A modern competitive take on the tycoon genre.  LINK HERE

How To Play

Click buy to place turrets, Press TAB to flip the board, use your mouse to click on turrets to upgrade them and coins to collect the gold.

Jam Info

Extra Sub Categories:  One Man Army (Work Alone), Tiny but Mighty (final build under 150 MB, Use it or Lose it(Use only 1 texture).

No assets to declare.  All shapes and props were made in engine during the jam, all sounds were made in audacity with my mouth during the jam.  One texture was used and was a colorful noise texture made in GIMP and used in a variety of ways including with particle affects.

Because I made everything by hand and went for super simple, I decided to make the Uproject files available to any dev who might want to review them for any purpose.  You can download them from my google drive found HERE

The project is 100% blueprint driven made in unreal engine 4.27.2.  All blueprints are commented but I have included a design_doc.txt file in the root directory that covers some of the logic flow for any newer dev who might need the reference.  If you need any help or information contact me on my discord HERE
